summary: Beneath Bruce Garrett's under-confident, overweight exterior, the passionate heart of a salsa king lies dormant. Now, one woman is about to reignite his Latin fire.
cast: Ben Radcliffe|Ian McShane|Isabella Steinbarth|Brandon Robinson|Louis Kyriacou|Kieran Gaffney|Nick Frost|Steve Oram|Chris O'Dowd|Alexandra Roach|Rashida Jones|Olivia Colman|Janine Wood|Rory Kinnear|Tim Plester|Kayvan Novak|Susana Montero|Yanet Fuentes|Michael Keat|Archibald Easton|Kengo Oshima|Christopher Painter|Stephanie Aslan|Eddie Bagayawa|Richard Banks|Claire Brummell|Liz Cackowski|Alex Clarke|Pamela Betsy Cooper|Leon Corbin|Philip Craik|Carol Cummings|Renato De Fazio|Simon DeSilva|Elia Diaz|Kevin Eldon|Pierre Henry|Richard Herdman|Graham Hughes|Joanna Jeffrees|Larissa Jones|Zulfu Kaplan|Phelim Kelly|Ethan J. title: Cuban Fury
